             java.lang.Object param,
             Delay.DelayListener listener)
        Constructor using default Scheduler
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval in milliseconds Must be greater than 2 milliseconds otherwise could lock up
        param - the parameter we want t pass back when our delay has completed
        listener - the listener to receive the callback when delay has finished
